description:
TweetList is a full-featured Twitter client that highlights Twitter lists. But even if you don't use Twitter lists, you'll love TweetList's speed and intuitive user interface. 

What people are saying: 

"... the organizational genius of TweetList for Twitter is a lifesaver." - Macworld.com 

"The way TweetList handles your Twitter lists is pure brilliance... swipe left and right to transition." — Hillel Fuld (appboy.com) 

"It's actually amazing. The lists feature is fantastic... All the other features are there. Big contender." — Apps & Hats (appsandhats.com) 

Highlights: 

- Full conversation view 
- Customizable list swipe interface 
- Dark and light themes 
- Native push notifications
- Inline photo previews
- Double tap and tap and hold shortcuts on tweets, user names and URLs 
- Multiple accounts
- User, hashtag, and client muting 
- Best in class VoiceOver accessibility 
- Full landscape mode 
- Twitlonger support and auto expand 
- Readability, Instapaper, ReadItLater support
- Autocomplete for user names and hash tags (TweetList's unique fuzzy matching algorithm)

For feedback or questions please email us at support@tweetli.st 

For more features and updates follow us on Twitter @tweetlist, visit our blog at tweetlist.posterous.com or visit our website at http://tweetli.st/. 

By Zooble - Simple Apps Are Best™
